Package io.github.blossomishymae.input

Class RelayCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.blossomishymae.input.RelayCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INotifyCanExecuteChanged, IRelayCommand
    public class RelayCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRelayCommand
    A command class used to repeats its functionality to other objects by invoking delegates. The default return value for canExecute() is true.

    The non-generic counterpart of ConveyCommand.
    See Also:
    ConveyCommand
